variation.name: 106-01-Non Empty TargetNamespace
variation.description: 106.01 Taxonomy schema has non-empty targetNamespace attribute value.

variation.name: 106-02-Empty TargetNamespace
variation.description: 106.02 Taxonomy schema has empty targetNamespace attribute value. Empty targetNamespace attribute is prohibited by Section 5.1.

variation.name: 106-03-TargetNamespace with xsd:include
variation.description: 106.03 Both including and included Taxonomy schemas have identical targetNamespace attribute values. Valid and XBRL specification 5.1 recommended approach.

variation.name: 106-04-NoTargetNamespace with xsd:include
variation.description: 106.04 Included taxonomy schema has no targetNamespace attribute but including taxonomy schema has targetNamespace attribute which it is valid. Even though this usage does not recommended by XBRL Specification section 5.1, this is valid.
